#Generic/Random cases were designed to first test each Op code at least 4 times
#Tests were generated by hand and with Java
#Edge tests were made for max/min inputs,overflows, etc. by hand
# max int: 2147483647
# min int: -2147483648

A[32] B[32] Op[4] Sa[5] C[32] V[1]
#Generic/Random tests
#NOT EQUAL
45 45 0000 0 0 0
45 6800 0000 0 1 0
1234567 5678 0000 0 1 0
6789 6789 0000 0 0 0

#EQUAL
45 45 0001 0 1 0
45 6800 0001 0 0 0
67890 67890 0001 0 1 0
1 2 0001 0 0 0

# XOR
33554432 1929129 0010 0 00000010000111010110111110101001 0
67 77 0010 0 14 0
23456 6789 0010 0 16677 0
9294924 2472841 0010 0 11038661 0

# NOR
45678 89102 0011 0 11111111111111100000000110010001 0
3333 4567 0011 0 -7640 0
443434 77789 0011 0 -520192 0
44444 5050505 0011 0 -5094814 0

# OR
239992 76543678 0100 0 76546046 0
9294924 2472841 0100 0 11403213 0
5656 7787 0100 0 7803 0
22 33 0100 0 55 0

#AND
239992 76543678 0101 0 237624 0
22 33 0101 0 0 0
4567 6789 0101 0 4229 0
1 1 0101 0 1 0

# ADD
3110 3410 0110 0 6520 0
4820 1 0111 0 4821 0
22 22 0111 0 44 0
31 31 0110 0 62 0

# SHIFT LEFT LOGICAL
567890 1712039923 1000 14 -369311744 0
5678 640828142 1001 28 -536870912 0
0 5656 1000 30 0 0
0 67896789 1001 15 48922624 0

#SUBTRACT
59 14 1010 0 45 0
34 0 1011 0 34 0
68 2 1010 0 66 0
9 8 1011 0 1 0

#SHIFT RIGHT LOGICAL
0 45 1100 1 22 0
0 67896789 1100 15 2072 0
0 788 1100 12 0 0
0 234567 1100 6 3665 0

#SHIFT RIGHT ARITHMETIC
0 397 1101 2 99 0
0 234567 1101 6 3665 0
0 -234567 1101 6 -3666 0
0 -788 1101 1 -394 0

# LESS THAN/EQUAL TO 0
-4 0 1110 0 1 0
4 0 1110 0 0 0
0 0 1110 0 1 0
2 0 1110 0 0 0

#GREATER THAN 0
4 0 1111 0 1 0
-1 0 1111 0 0 0
67 0 1111 0 1 0
-67 0 1111 0 0 0

# Edge Cases
# a b Op 0 C 0
#NOT EQUAL
2147483647 2147483647 0000 0 0 0 #max ints
-2147483648 -2147483648 0000 0 0 0 #min int
2147483647 -2147483648 0000 0 1 0 #max/min int
#EQUAL
2147483647 2147483647 0001 0 1 0 #max ints
-2147483648 -2147483648 0001 0 1 0 #min int
2147483647 -2147483648 0001 0 0 0 #max/min int

# XOR
2147483647 2147483647 0010 0 0 0 #max ints
-2147483648 -2147483648 0010 0 0 0 #min int
2147483647 -2147483648 0010 0 -1 0 #max/min int

# NOR
2147483647 2147483647 0011 0 2147483648 0 #max ints
2147483647 -2147483648 0011 0 0 0 #max/min int

# OR
2147483647 2147483647 0100 0 2147483647 0 #max ints
-2147483648 -2147483648 0100 0 -2147483648 0 #min int
2147483647 -2147483648 0100 0 -1 0 #max/min int

# AND
2147483647 2147483647 0101 0 2147483647 0 #max ints
-2147483648 -2147483648 0101 0 -2147483648 0 #min int
2147483647 -2147483648 0101 0 0 0 #max/min int

# ADD
2147483644 2147483644 0110 0 -8 1 #addition overflow

# SHIFT LEFT LOGICAL
10 10 1001 31 0 0 # max left shift

#SUBTRACT
-2147483644 1073741824 1010 0 1073741828 1 #subtraction overflow

# SHIFT RIGHT LOGICAL
10000000 10000000 1100 31 0 0 # max right shift logical

# SHIFT RIGHT ARITHMETIC
-10 -10000000000 1101 31 -1 0 # max right shift arithmatic negative number

# LESS THAN/EQUAL TO 0
0 1 1110 0 1 0 #le A = 0

# GREATER THAN 0
0 1 1111 0 0 0  #gt A = 0
